Player 's Handbook

Kingdoms rich in ancient grandeur, hall carve into the root of mountain, the echo of pick and hammer in deep mine and blazing forge, a commitment to clan and tradition, and a burning hatred of goblin and orcs – these common thread unite all dwarf.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increase by 2.
Age. Dwarves mature at the same rate a human, but they 're consider young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 year.

Alignment. Most dwarf be lawful, believe firmly in the benefit of a well-ordered society. They tend toward good a well, with a strong sense of fair play and a belief that everyone deserves to share in the benefit of a just order.
Size. Dwarves stand between 4 and 5 foot tall and average about 150 pound. Your size be Medium.
Speed. Your base walk speed be 25 foot. Your speed be not reduce by wear heavy armor.

Darkvision. Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim condition. You can see in dim light within 60 foot of you a if it be bright light, and in darkness a if it be dim light. You ca n't discern color in darkness, only shade of gray.
Dwarven Resilience. You have advantage on save throw against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.
Dwarven Combat Training. You have proficiency with the battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and warhammer.
Tool Proficiency. You gain proficiency with the artisan 's tool of your choice: smith 's tool, brewer 's supply, or mason 's tool.

Stonecunning. Whenever you make an Intelligence( History) check related to the origin of stonework, you be consider proficient in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and Dwarvish. Dwarvish be full of hard consonant and guttural sound, and those characteristic spill over into whatever other language a dwarf might speak.
Hill Dwarf

As a hill dwarf, you have keen sens, deep intuition, and remarkable resilience. The gold dwarf of Faerun in their mighty southern kingdom be hill dwarf, a be the exile Neidar and the debase Klar of Krynn in the Dragonlance set.
Ability Score Increase. Your Wisdom score increase by 1.
Dwarven Toughness. Your hit point maximum increase by 1, and it increase by 1 every time you gain a level.
Mountain Dwarf

As a mountain dwarf, you 're strong and hardy, accustom to a difficult life in rugged terrain. You 're probably on the tall side( for a dwarf), and tend toward lighter coloration, The shield dwarf of northern Faerun, a well a the ruling Hylar clan and the noble Daewar clan of Dragonlance, be mountain dwarf.
Ability Score Increase. Your Strength score increase by 2.
Dwarven Armor Training. You have proficiency with light and medium armor.
